question.text: You have broken down on a two-way road. You have a warning triangle. It should be displayed

explanation.text: If you need to display a warning triangle make sure that it can be clearly seen by other road users. Place it on the same side of the road as the broken down vehicle and away from any obstruction that would make it hard to see.

answer.text: on the roof of your vehicle
at least 150 metres (492 feet) behind your vehicle
at least 45 metres (147 feet) behind your vehicle
